Package controller_view

Class DrawingCanvas

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
controller_view.DrawingCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class DrawingCanvas extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas implements Serializable
DrawingCanvas: A canvas for drawing on with different tools. This class extends the Canvas class and provides functionality for drawing on a canvas using various drawing tools. It handles mouse events for drawing and allows users to select a current drawing tool, pen color, and perform freehand drawing.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Doom Al Rajhi, Vivian Alonso, Tanay Desai
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • undoRedoManager

      public UndoRedoManager undoRedoManager
      Manages undo and redo actions on the canvas.

    • hasChanges

      public boolean hasChanges
      Indicates whether there are unsaved changes on the drawing canvas. If true, there are unsaved changes; if false, there are no unsaved changes.
